entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
